de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.impl.profile.operations

Class DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adorsys.datasafe.directory.impl.profile.operations.DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProfileOperations, ProfileRegistrationService, ProfileRemovalService, ProfileRetrievalService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DFSBasedProfileStorageImplRuntimeDelegatable

    public class DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl
extends Object
implements ProfileOperations
    Aggregate view of profile operations for DFS-based profiles.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DFSBasedProfileStorageImpl(ProfileRegistrationService registrationService, ProfileRetrievalService retrievalService, ProfileRemovalService removalService) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deregister(UserIDAuth arg0)
      Removes both public and private profile from system associated with user IMPORTANT! Ensure (in case of multi-tenant deployment) that all caches are cleared for removed user: KeyStoreCache, UserProfileCache (if used) or use globally unique username+password combination each time you create new user.
      UserPrivateProfile privateProfile(UserIDAuth arg0)
      Resolves user's private meta-information like privatespace,keystore, etc.
      UserPublicProfile publicProfile(UserID arg0)
      Resolves user's public meta-information like INBOX, public keys, etc.
      void registerPrivate(CreateUserPrivateProfile arg0)
      Registers private part of user profile - his keystore location, private folder location, etc.
      void registerPublic(CreateUserPublicProfile arg0)
      Registers public part of user's profile - his INBOX and where are his public keys.
      void registerUsingDefaults(UserIDAuth arg0)
      Register user using all-default values.
      boolean userExists(UserID arg0)

    • Method Detail

      • registerPublic

        public void registerPublic(CreateUserPublicProfile arg0)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileRegistrationService
        Registers public part of user's profile - his INBOX and where are his public keys. IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Specified by:
        registerPublic in interface ProfileRegistrationService
        Parameters:
        arg0 - Public profile part

      • registerPrivate

        public void registerPrivate(CreateUserPrivateProfile arg0)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileRegistrationService
        Registers private part of user profile - his keystore location, private folder location, etc. Also creates his keystore if it does not exist at specified location and in that case publishes users' public keys into location specified by users' public profile IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Specified by:
        registerPrivate in interface ProfileRegistrationService
        Parameters:
        arg0 - Private profile part

      • registerUsingDefaults

        public void registerUsingDefaults(UserIDAuth arg0)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileRegistrationService
        Register user using all-default values. IMPORTANT: For cases when user profile is stored on S3 without object locks, this requires some global synchronization due to eventual consistency or you need to supply globally unique username on registration.
        Specified by:
        registerUsingDefaults in interface ProfileRegistrationService
        Parameters:
        arg0 - User authorization to register

      • deregister

        public void deregister(UserIDAuth arg0)
        Description copied from interface: ProfileRemovalService
        Removes both public and private profile from system associated with user IMPORTANT! Ensure (in case of multi-tenant deployment) that all caches are cleared for removed user: KeyStoreCache, UserProfileCache (if used) or use globally unique username+password combination each time you create new user.
        Specified by:
        deregister in interface ProfileRemovalService
        Parameters:
        arg0 - public and private profile owner
